00027 // ProactorSerivce
00029 class ProactorSerivce : public lsf::basic::NonCopyable, public lsf::basic::Error {
00030 public:
00031     static const size_t MAX_WAIT_MILLI_SECONDS = 10;
00032     static const size_t MAX_BUFFER_LEN = 128 * 1024;
00033     friend ProactorSerivce* Inspect(ProactorSerivce* ptr);
00034 
00035     static ProactorSerivce* Inspect(ProactorSerivce* ptr) { return ptr; }
00036 
00037 public:
00038     ProactorSerivce(BasicEventDriver* pdriver) : _pdriver(pdriver) {}
00039 
00041     // Async Accept
00042     template <typename HandlerType1, typename HandlerType2 = std::nullptr_t>
00043     bool AsyncAccept(SharedSocket shared_socket, HandlerType1&& handler, HandlerType2&& fail_handler = nullptr) {
00044         // register event
00045         if (!_pdriver->RegisterEvent(shared_socket->SockFd(), BasicEventDriver::FLAG_READ)) {
00046             SetErrString(LSF_DEBUG_INFO + _pdriver->ErrString());
00047             return false;
00048         }
00049 
00050         // add completion task
00051         auto shared_completion = _queue.GetAndCreateReadCompletionFunc(shared_socket->SockFd());
00052         shared_completion->action = CompletionQueue::ACTION_ACCEPT;
00053         shared_completion->accept_func = std::forward<HandlerType1>(handler);
00054         shared_completion->accept_fail_func = std::forward<HandlerType2>(fail_handler);
00055         shared_completion->shared_socket = shared_socket;
00056         return true;
00057     }
00058 
00060     // Async Connect
00061     template <typename HandlerType1, typename HandlerType2 = std::nullptr_t>
00062     inline bool AsyncConnect(SharedSocket shared_socket, Address const& address, uint16_t port, HandlerType1&& handler, HandlerType2&& fail_handler = nullptr) {
00063         return AsyncConnect(shared_socket, SockAddr(address, port), handler, fail_handler);
00064     }
00065 
00066     template <typename HandlerType1, typename HandlerType2 = std::nullptr_t>
00067     bool AsyncConnect(SharedSocket shared_socket, SockAddr const& sockaddr, HandlerType1&& handler, HandlerType2&& fail_handler = nullptr) {
00068         // try connect
00069         int ret = ::connect(shared_socket->SockFd(), sockaddr.data(), sockaddr.size());
00070         if (ret != 0 && errno != EINPROGRESS) {
00071             SetErrString(LSF_DEBUG_INFO + SysErrString());
00072             return false;
00073         }
00074 
00075         // register event
00076         if (!_pdriver->RegisterEvent(shared_socket->SockFd(), BasicEventDriver::FLAG_WRITE)) {
00077             SetErrString(LSF_DEBUG_INFO + _pdriver->ErrString());
00078             return false;
00079         }
00080 
00081         // add completion task
00082         auto shared_completion = _queue.GetAndCreateWriteCompletionFunc(shared_socket->SockFd());
00083         shared_completion->action = CompletionQueue::ACTION_CONNECT;
00084         shared_completion->connect_func = std::forward<HandlerType1>(handler);
00085         shared_completion->connect_fail_func = std::forward<HandlerType2>(fail_handler);
00086         shared_completion->sockaddr = sockaddr;
00087         shared_completion->shared_socket = shared_socket;
00088         return true;
00089     }
00090 
00092     // Async Send
00093     LSF_FUNC_ALIAS(AsyncWrite, AsyncSend)
00094 
00095     template <typename StringType, typename HandlerType>
00096     bool AsyncWrite(SharedSocket shared_socket, StringType&& buffer, HandlerType&& handler) {
00097         // register event
00098         if (!_pdriver->RegisterEvent(shared_socket->SockFd(), BasicEventDriver::FLAG_WRITE)) {
00099             SetErrString(LSF_DEBUG_INFO + _pdriver->ErrString());
00100             return false;
00101         }
00102 
00103         // add completion task
00104         auto shared_completion = _queue.GetAndCreateWriteCompletionFunc(shared_socket->SockFd());
00105         shared_completion->action = CompletionQueue::ACTION_WRITE;
00106         shared_completion->write_func = std::forward<HandlerType>(handler);
00107         shared_completion->buffer = std::forward<StringType>(buffer);
00108         shared_completion->shared_socket = shared_socket;
00109         return true;
00110     }
00111 
00113     // Async Recv
00114     LSF_FUNC_ALIAS(AsyncRead, AsycRecv)
00115 
00116     template <typename HandlerType1, typename HandlerType2 = std::nullptr_t>
00117     bool AsyncRead(SharedSocket shared_socket, HandlerType1&& handler, HandlerType2&& peer_close_handler = nullptr) {
00118         // register event
00119         if (!_pdriver->RegisterEvent(shared_socket->SockFd(), BasicEventDriver::FLAG_READ)) {
00120             SetErrString(LSF_DEBUG_INFO + _pdriver->ErrString());
00121             return false;
00122         }
00123 
00124         // add completion task
00125         auto shared_completion = _queue.GetAndCreateReadCompletionFunc(shared_socket->SockFd());
00126         shared_completion->action = CompletionQueue::ACTION_READ;
00127         shared_completion->read_func = std::forward<HandlerType1>(handler);
00128         shared_completion->read_peer_close_func = std::forward<HandlerType2>(peer_close_handler);
00129         shared_completion->shared_socket = shared_socket;
00130         return true;
00131     }
00132 
00134     // Async Raw Callback
00135     template<typename HandlerType>
00136     bool AsyncRawCallback(int sockfd, int flags, HandlerType&& handler) {
00137         // register event
00138         if (!_pdriver->RegisterEvent(sockfd, flags)) {
00139             SetErrString(LSF_DEBUG_INFO + _pdriver->ErrString());
00140             return false;
00141         }
00142 
00143         // add completion task
00144         auto shared_completion = _queue.GetAndCreateRawCompletionFunc(sockfd);
00145         shared_completion->raw_func = std::forward<HandlerType>(handler);
00146         return true;
00147     }

00150     // Async Timer
00151     template <typename HandlerType>
00152     int AsyncAddTimerOnce(uint64_t milli_expire, HandlerType&& handler) {
00153         return AsyncAddTimer(milli_expire, 0, 1, std::forward<HandlerType>(handler));
00154     }
00155 
00156     template <typename HandlerType>
00157     int AsyncAddTimerForever(uint64_t milli_expire, HandlerType&& handler) {
00158         return AsyncAddTimer(milli_expire, milli_expire, 0, std::forward<HandlerType>(handler));
00159     }
00160 
00161     template <typename HandlerType>
00162     int AsyncAddTimerForeverAndTriggerNow(uint64_t milli_expire, HandlerType&& handler) {
00163         return AsyncAddTimer(1, milli_expire, 0, std::forward<HandlerType>(handler));
00164     }
00165 
00166     template <typename HandlerType>
00167     int AsyncAddTimerMulti(uint64_t milli_expire, size_t trigger_count, HandlerType&& handler) {
00168         return AsyncAddTimer(milli_expire, milli_expire, trigger_count, std::forward<HandlerType>(handler));
00169     }
00170 
00171     template <typename HandlerType>
00172     int AsyncAddTimer(uint64_t milli_expire, uint64_t milli_interval, size_t trigger_count, HandlerType&& handler) {
00173         // check input
00174         if (milli_expire == 0) milli_expire = 1;
00175 
00176         // create timer
00177         int fd = ErrWrap(::timerfd_create(CLOCK_REALTIME, TFD_NONBLOCK));
00178         if (fd < 0) return -1;
00179 
00180         // set timeout
00181         itimerspec timer_info;
00182         timer_info.it_value.tv_sec = milli_expire / 1000;
00183         timer_info.it_value.tv_nsec = (milli_expire % 1000) * 1000000;
00184         timer_info.it_interval.tv_sec = milli_interval / 1000;
00185         timer_info.it_interval.tv_nsec = (milli_interval % 1000) * 1000000;
00186         if (ErrWrap(::timerfd_settime(fd, 0, &timer_info, nullptr)) < 0) {
00187             ::close(fd);
00188             return -1;
00189         }
00190 
00191         // register event
00192         if (!_pdriver->RegisterEvent(fd, BasicEventDriver::FLAG_READ)) {
00193             ::close(fd);
00194             SetErrString(LSF_DEBUG_INFO + _pdriver->ErrString());
00195             return -1;
00196         }
00197 
00198         // add completion task
00199         auto shared_completion = _queue.GetAndCreateReadCompletionFunc(fd);
00200         shared_completion->action = CompletionQueue::ACTION_TIMER;
00201         shared_completion->timer_func = std::forward<HandlerType>(handler);
00202         shared_completion->timer_count = trigger_count;
00203         shared_completion->timer_fd = fd;
00204         return fd;
00205     }
00206 
00207     std::pair<uint64_t,uint64_t> AsyncGetTimer(int fd) {
00208         // get timer
00209         itimerspec timer_info;
00210         if (ErrWrap(::timerfd_gettime(fd, &timer_info)) < 0) return std::make_pair(0,0);
00211 
00212         uint64_t expire = timer_info.it_value.tv_sec * 1000 + timer_info.it_value.tv_nsec / 1000;
00213         uint64_t interval = timer_info.it_interval.tv_sec * 1000 + timer_info.it_interval.tv_nsec / 1000;
00214         return std::make_pair(expire, interval);
00215     }
00216 
00218     // Async Close
00219 public:
00220     void AsyncCancel(SharedSocket socket) {
00221         if (socket) AsyncCancel(socket->SockFd());
00222     }
00223 
00224     void AsyncCancel(int fd) {
00225         // cancel registration
00226         _pdriver->CancelEvent(fd);
00227 
00228         // cancel completion task
00229         _queue.CancelReadCompletionFunc(fd);
00230         _queue.CancelWriteCompletionFunc(fd);
00231         _queue.CancelRawCompletionFunc(fd);
00232 
00233         // clear unused data
00234         ReadDataBuffer::Instance()->ClearUnusedData(fd);
00235     }
00236 
00237     void AsyncCloseTimer(int sockfd) {
00238         AsyncCancel(sockfd);
00239         ::close(sockfd);
00240     }
00241 
00243     // Main Routine
00244     void Run() {
00245         while (true) {
00246             int fd, flag;
00247 
00248             // update clock
00249             UpdateClock();
00250 
00251             // wait events
00252             _pdriver->WaitEvent(MAX_WAIT_MILLI_SECONDS);
00253 
00254             // traverse ready events
00255             while (_pdriver->GetReadyEvent(&fd, &flag)) {
00256                 // if register raw completion, just callback
00257                 auto raw_completion = _queue.GetRawCompletionFunc(fd);
00258                 if (raw_completion) {
00259                     if (raw_completion->raw_func) raw_completion->raw_func(fd, flag);
00260                     continue;
00261                 }
00262 
00263                 // read action
00264                 if (flag & BasicEventDriver::FLAG_READ) {
00265                     auto read_completion = _queue.GetReadCompletionFunc(fd);
00266                     if (read_completion) {
00267                         switch (read_completion->action) {
00268                             case CompletionQueue::ACTION_ACCEPT: OnAcceptEvent(read_completion); break;
00269                             case CompletionQueue::ACTION_READ:   OnReadEvent(read_completion);   break;
00270                             case CompletionQueue::ACTION_TIMER:  OnTimerEvent(read_completion);  break;
00271                             default: break;
00272                         }
00273                     }
00274                     else {
00275                         LSF_LOG_FAT("cant get read handler but event triggers, fd=%u", fd);
00276                         AsyncCancel(fd);
00277                     }
00278                 }
00279 
00280                 // write action
00281                 if (flag & BasicEventDriver::FLAG_WRITE) {
00282                     auto write_completion = _queue.GetWriteCompletionFunc(fd);
00283                     if (write_completion) {
00284                         switch (write_completion->action) {
00285                             case CompletionQueue::ACTION_WRITE:   OnWriteEvent(write_completion);   break;
00286                             case CompletionQueue::ACTION_CONNECT: OnConnectEvent(write_completion); break;
00287                             default: break;
00288                         }
00289                     }
00290                     else {
00291                         LSF_LOG_FAT("cant get write handler buf event triggers, fd=%u", fd);
00292                         AsyncCancel(fd);
00293                     }
00294                 }
00295 
00296                 // error handle
00297                 if (flag & BasicEventDriver::FLAG_ERR) {
00298                     OnErrorEvent(fd);
00299                 }
00300             }
00301 
00302             // check exit
00303             if (_is_exit) {
00304                 _is_exit = false;
00305                 break;
00306             }
00307         }
00308     }
00309 
00311     // Accept Event
00312     void OnAcceptEvent(CompletionQueue::shared_read_completion_type shared_completion) {
00313         // accept
00314         SharedSocket shared_accept_socket(shared_completion->shared_socket->Accept());
00315         if (!shared_accept_socket) {
00316             SetErrString(LSF_DEBUG_INFO + shared_completion->shared_socket->ErrString());
00317             if (shared_completion->accept_fail_func) shared_completion->accept_fail_func(shared_completion->shared_socket);
00318             return;
00319         }
00320 
00321         // call accept handler
00322         if (shared_completion->accept_func) shared_completion->accept_func(shared_completion->shared_socket, shared_accept_socket);
00323     }
00324 
00326     // Connect Event
00327     void OnConnectEvent(CompletionQueue::shared_write_completion_type shared_completion) {
00328         // check ret
00329         if (!shared_completion->shared_socket->CheckSockError()) {
00330             SetErrString(LSF_DEBUG_INFO + shared_completion->shared_socket->ErrString());
00331             if (shared_completion->connect_fail_func) shared_completion->connect_fail_func(shared_completion->shared_socket, shared_completion->sockaddr);
00332             AsyncCancel(shared_completion->shared_socket);
00333             return;
00334         }
00335 
00336         // always cancel write registration after trigger, must do before callback
00337         AsyncCancel(shared_completion->shared_socket->SockFd());
00338 
00339         // set connect status
00340         shared_completion->shared_socket->_is_connect = true;
00341 
00342         // call write handler
00343         if (shared_completion->connect_func)
00344             shared_completion->connect_func(shared_completion->shared_socket, shared_completion->sockaddr);
00345     }
00346 
00348     // Write Event
00349     void OnWriteEvent(CompletionQueue::shared_write_completion_type shared_completion) {
00350         // write data
00351         size_t total = 0;
00352         auto& shared_socket = shared_completion->shared_socket;
00353         auto& buffer = shared_completion->buffer;
00354         while (total < shared_completion->buffer.length()) {
00355             // try send
00356             int ret = ::send(shared_socket->SockFd(), buffer.data()+total, buffer.length()-total, 0);
00357 
00358             // handle error
00359             if (ret < 0) {
00360                 if (errno == EINTR || errno == EAGAIN || errno == EWOULDBLOCK) { // signal interrupt or not ready
00361                     continue;
00362                 }
00363                 else { // error
00364                     AsyncCancel(shared_socket);
00365                     shared_socket->ShutDown();
00366                     return;
00367                 }
00368             }
00369 
00370             // handle send data
00371             total += ret;
00372         }
00373 
00374         // call write handler
00375         if (shared_completion->write_func)
00376             shared_completion->write_func(shared_socket, shared_completion->buffer);
00377 
00378         // always cancel write registration after event
00379         AsyncCancel(shared_socket->SockFd());
00380     }
00381 
00383     // Read Event
00384     void OnReadEvent(CompletionQueue::shared_read_completion_type shared_completion) {
00385         // first check and append unused data
00386         auto& shared_socket = shared_completion->shared_socket;
00387         std::string buffer;
00388         ReadDataBuffer::Instance()->CheckUnusedData(shared_socket->SockFd(), buffer);
00389 
00390         // read loop
00391         bool shutdown_socket = false;
00392         bool peer_close = false;
00393         while (true) {
00394             char tmp[MAX_BUFFER_LEN];
00395             ssize_t ret = ::recv(shared_socket->SockFd(), tmp, sizeof(tmp), 0);
00396 
00397             // handle error
00398             if (ret < 0) {
00399                 if (errno == EINTR) { // signal interrupt
00400                     continue;
00401                 } else if (errno == EAGAIN || errno == EWOULDBLOCK) { // no data
00402                     break;
00403                 } else { // error
00404                     shutdown_socket = true;
00405                     break;
00406                 }
00407             }
00408 
00409             // handle shared_socket close
00410             if (ret == 0) {
00411                 peer_close = true;
00412                 shutdown_socket = true;
00413                 break;
00414             }
00415 
00416             // handle read data
00417             buffer.append(tmp, ret);
00418         }
00419 
00420         // handle read first
00421         if (!buffer.empty() && shared_completion->read_func) shared_completion->read_func(shared_socket, buffer);
00422 
00423         // handle shutdown connection
00424         if (shutdown_socket) {
00425             AsyncCancel(shared_socket);
00426             shared_socket->ShutDown();
00427         }
00428 
00429         // handle peer close
00430         if (peer_close && shared_completion->read_peer_close_func) shared_completion->read_peer_close_func(shared_socket);
00431 
00432     }
00433 
00435     // Timer Event
00436     void OnTimerEvent(CompletionQueue::shared_read_completion_type shared_completion) {
00437         // read data
00438         uint64_t count;
00439         int timer_fd = shared_completion->timer_fd;
00440         int ret = ::read(timer_fd, &count, sizeof(count));
00441         if (ret != sizeof(count)) { // return error
00442             // not block reason then close
00443             if (ret != EAGAIN) AsyncCloseTimer(timer_fd);
00444             return;
00445         }
00446 
00447         // call write handler as many as it triggers
00448         bool should_delete = false;
00449         for (uint64_t i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00450             // callback
00451             if (shared_completion->timer_func) shared_completion->timer_func(timer_fd);
00452 
00453             // check remain count
00454             if (shared_completion->timer_count == 1) {
00455                 should_delete = true;
00456                 break;
00457             }
00458             else if (shared_completion->timer_count != 0) {
00459                 shared_completion->timer_count--;
00460             }
00461         }
00462 
00463         // check if need delete
00464         if (should_delete) {
00465             AsyncCloseTimer(timer_fd);
00466             return;
00467         }
00468         if (AsyncGetTimer(timer_fd).second == 0) {
00469             AsyncCloseTimer(timer_fd);
00470             return;
00471         }
00472     }
00473 
00475     // Error Event
00476     void OnErrorEvent(int fd) {
00477         // check read completion
00478         auto shared_read_completion = _queue.GetReadCompletionFunc(fd);
00479         if (shared_read_completion) {
00480             if (shared_read_completion->action == CompletionQueue::ACTION_TIMER) {
00481                 // just release timer
00482                 AsyncCloseTimer(fd);
00483             }
00484             else {
00485                 // shutdown shared_socket
00486                 AsyncCancel(shared_read_completion->shared_socket);
00487                 shared_read_completion->shared_socket->ShutDown();
00488             }
00489         }
00490 
00491         // check write completion
00492         auto shared_write_completion = _queue.GetWriteCompletionFunc(fd);
00493         if (shared_write_completion) {
00494             // check connect fail action
00495             if (shared_write_completion->action == CompletionQueue::ACTION_CONNECT) {
00496                 shared_write_completion->shared_socket->CheckSockError();
00497                 SetErrString(LSF_DEBUG_INFO + shared_write_completion->shared_socket->ErrString());
00498                 if (shared_write_completion->connect_fail_func)
00499                     shared_write_completion->connect_fail_func(shared_write_completion->shared_socket, shared_write_completion->sockaddr);
00500             }
00501 
00502             // shutdown
00503             AsyncCancel(shared_write_completion->shared_socket);
00504             shared_write_completion->shared_socket->ShutDown();
00505         }
00506     }
00507 
00509     // Other Func
00510     template<typename SharedSocket>
00511     void SaveUnusedData(SharedSocket shared_socket, std::string const& data) {
00512         ReadDataBuffer::Instance()->AppendUnusedData(shared_socket->SockFd(), data);
00513     }
00514     template<typename SharedSocket>
00515     void SaveUnusedData(SharedSocket shared_socket, char const* data, size_t len) {
00516         ReadDataBuffer::Instance()->AppendUnusedData(shared_socket->SockFd(), data, len);
00517     }
00518 
00519     void SetExit() { _is_exit = true; }
00520 
00521     uint64_t ClockTime() const { return _ts.tv_sec + _ts.tv_nsec / 1000000000; }
00522     uint64_t ClockTimeMilli() const { return _ts.tv_sec * 1000 + _ts.tv_nsec / 1000000; }
00523     uint64_t ClockTimeMicro() const { return _ts.tv_sec * 1000000 + _ts.tv_nsec / 1000; }
00524     uint64_t ClockTimeNano() const { return _ts.tv_sec * 1000000000 + _ts.tv_nsec; }
00525     uint64_t RealClockTime() { UpdateClock(); return ClockTime(); }
00526     uint64_t RealClockTimeMilli() { UpdateClock(); return ClockTimeMilli(); }
00527     uint64_t RealClockTimeMicro() { UpdateClock(); return ClockTimeMicro(); }
00528     uint64_t RealClockTimeNano() { UpdateClock(); return ClockTimeNano(); }
00529 
00530     BasicEventDriver const* Driver() const { return _pdriver; }
00531     CompletionQueue const& Queue() const { return _queue; }
00532 
00533 private:
00534     void UpdateClock() { ::clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &_ts); }
00535 
00536 private:
00537     BasicEventDriver* _pdriver = nullptr;
00538     bool              _is_exit = false;
00539     timespec          _ts      = {0,0};
00540     CompletionQueue   _queue;
00541 };
